name: Tools4Boards Switch 0+7 Sidewall Trimmer + Scraper Sharpener
description: The ultimate sidewall trimmer and scraper sharpener guide. This modular system allows you to switch from a 7° angle guide to trim your ski sidewalls, to a 0° angle guide to get your wax scraper back to its sharp state. The Switch 0+7 allows you to remove just the right amount of material to extend the life of your skis or board.Made of 4.5mm-thick surgical-grade stainless steel for durability.Modular 0°+7° angle bar is precision milled from aircraft grade aluminum, sand blasted and anodized.Durable laser-etched angle number markings won't wear off.Wear plate cutout allows for sidewall filings and debris to fall away from base.Additional wear plate screw ports allow a second angular bar to be mounted. Extra angle bars sold separately.Compatible with all interchangeable Switch system components.
